attributes.action: Debate to innovate our outdated parliamentary system.
attributes.background: Brexit negotiations have highlighted to our nation that our government is not able to effectively handle complex parliamentary matters, especially in times of division. We need to start the conversation around how we can change our outdated system and how we can use technology to work for us.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We are not sure how you want to change the current system, or what you mean by making technology working for us. 

You may like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/242856
